articles.title: Activision Blizzard Staff Announce Walkout to Protest Roe vs. Wade Reversal - IGN
articles.description: Activision Blizzard staff are staging a walkout later this month in protest of the U.S. Supreme Court's reversal of Roe vs. Wade, the historic judgement used to secure abortion rights across the country.

articles.title: Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown - Together We Drive Trailer - IGN
articles.description: The latest in the long-running Test Drive Unlimited series, Test Drive Unlimited: Solar Crown, is set to release in 2023. Check out the latest trailer featuring just a tease of what players can expect from this open world racer.
